languages.text: "Какая поучительная история! Ты можешь быть примером из учебника на тему "Почему не надо гоняться за миражами".
"A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."
languages.original_text: "Какая поучительная история! Ты можешь быть примером из учебника на тему "Почему не надо гоняться за миражами".

traits.locale_text: "What a splendid cautionary tale! You could serve as a textbook example titled, 'The Folly of Chasing Wild Fantasies.'"
"What a splendid cautionary tale! You could serve as a textbook example titled, 'The Folly of Chasing Wild Fantasies.'"
"A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."
"A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."
"A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

languages.text: 「説得力のある教訓だ！荒唐無稽な幻想を追い求めることの愚かさについて書かれた本があれば、お前の話で丸々1章は書けるだろう」
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: 「説得力のある教訓だ！荒唐無稽な幻想を追い求めることの愚かさについて書かれた本があれば、お前の話で丸々1章は書けるだろう」

languages.text: “这简直可以当成警示故事了！如果有谁打算写本书，讲述各种追逐疯狂幻想的愚行，那你的经历恐怕能写上整整一章。”
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: “这简直可以当成警示故事了！如果有谁打算写本书，讲述各种追逐疯狂幻想的愚行，那你的经历恐怕能写上整整一章。”

languages.text: «¡Una moraleja estupenda! Si existiera un libro sobre la locura de perseguir fantasías descabelladas, ocuparía un capítulo entero».
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: «¡Una moraleja estupenda! Si existiera un libro sobre la locura de perseguir fantasías descabelladas, ocuparía un capítulo entero».

languages.text: « Et voilà ce qui se passe quand on chasse des chimères. »
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: « Et voilà ce qui se passe quand on chasse des chimères. »

languages.text: "Eine faszinierende Geschichte zur Abschreckung. Gäbe es ein Buch über die Dummheit, wilden Fantasien nachzujagen, wäre Euch ein ganzes Kapitel gewidmet."
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: "Eine faszinierende Geschichte zur Abschreckung. Gäbe es ein Buch über die Dummheit, wilden Fantasien nachzujagen, wäre Euch ein ganzes Kapitel gewidmet."

languages.text: "Enteresan bir ibret hikâyesi! Çılgın fanteziler peşinde koşmanın aptallığı üzerine kitap yazsalar koca bir bölüm kapardın."
languages.original_text: "A compelling cautionary tale! If there was a book on the folly of chasing wild fantasies, you would take up a whole chapter."

traits.locale_text: "Enteresan ve eğitici bir hikâye! Çılgın fanteziler peşinde koşmanın nasıl da ahmaklık olduğu hakkında bir kitap yazsalar, yaşam hikâyenle kitabın koca bir bölümünü doldurabilirlermiş."
